desc: DDAF-branded merchandise. All proceeds benefit DDAF.

layout.text: Welcome to the new DDAF Online Store!

We hope you enjoy shopping in our new store. All proceeds directly benefit the Doris Day Animal Foundation. All stated prices include the cost of shipping via U.S. Postal Service and handling. We are pleased to announce we now accept orders shipping to addresses in Canada, Mexico, the UK, and Australia! International shipping charges will be calculated at checkout. Customers outside the U.S. will be responsible for import customs and duty fees.
